message: Let's split it 90/10. I get the lion's share, but you get a decent start.  What do you say?
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not giving away the farm just yet. Your turn to counter.
Let's meet in the middle this time.  I'm willing to take a smaller share now, but I need something fairer than your last offer. What do you say?
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much. You're getting a good chunk, but I'm still the one who's going to come out on top.
This is my final offer. We split it 50/50. It's a fair deal and the best we can both do at this point. What do you say?
